member.summary: Поле - используется для отображения системных переменных в заголовках или подвале отчета

member.name: T:Intersoft.Cissa.Report.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Intersoft.Cissa.Report.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Intersoft.Cissa.Report.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Intersoft.Cissa.Report.Resources.CompanyName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Intersoft.

member.name: P:Intersoft.Cissa.Report.Resources.logo
member.summary: Looks up a localized resource of type System.Drawing.Bitmap.

member.name: P:Intersoft.Cissa.Report.Resources.ReportApplicationName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to CISSA.Reports.ExcelReport.
